TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISelectionProvider

summary.span: 公開方法與屬性，以支援控制項的使用者介面自動化用戶端存取，這些控制項的作用如同個別的、可選取的子系項目集合的容器。

span.span: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to controls that act as containers for a collection of individual, selectable child items.

summary.span: 此控制項的子項必須實作 。

span.span: The children of this control must implement .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作 UI 自動化提供者必須支援控制項模式。Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the control pattern.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CanSelectMultiple As Boolean
public: property bool CanSelectMultiple { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指定使用者介面自動化提供者是否允許同時選取一個以上的子項目。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the UI Automation provider allows more than one child element to be selected concurrently.

value.span: 如果允許多重選取，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if multiple selection is allowed; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可能是動態的。This property may be dynamic. 例如，在罕見的情況下控制項可能會允許在初始化時選取，但接著只允許單一選取進行多個項目。For example, in rare cases a control might allow multiple items to be selected on initialization but subsequently allow only single selections to be made. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的清單，不允許選取多個項目一次此方法的實作。The following example shows an implementation of this method for a list that does not allow selection of more than one item at a time. [!code-csharp[UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip#CanSelectMultiple](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/CSharp/ListFragment.cs#canselectmultiple)] [!code-vb[UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip#CanSelectMultiple](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/visualbasic/listfragment.vb#canselectmultiple)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple[] GetSelection() cil managed

summary.span: 擷取每個子項目所選取的 UI 自動化提供者。

span.span: Retrieves a UI Automation provider for each child element that is selected.

returns.span: UI 自動化提供者的集合。

span.span: A collection of UI Automation providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UIAutoCore.dll 提供者未提供值時，會傳回預設的空陣列。A default empty array is returned by UIAutoCore.dll when the provider doesn't supply a value. ## Examples 下列範例會示範一個可能的實作，這個方法僅支援單一選取清單方塊。The following example shows one possible implementation of this method for a list box that supports only single selection. [!code-csharp[UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip#GetSelection](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/CSharp/ListFragment.cs#getselection)] [!code-vb[UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip#GetSelection](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/visualbasic/listfragment.vb#getselection)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSelectionRequired As Boolean
public: property bool IsSelectionRequired { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指定使用者介面自動化提供者是否需要至少選取一個子項目。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the UI Automation provider requires at least one child element to be selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以是動態的。This property can be dynamic. 例如，控制項的初始狀態可能沒有預設值，表示選取任何項目是`false`。For example, the initial state of a control might not have any items selected by default, meaning that is `false`. 不過，在選取項目之後，控制項就必須至少有一個項目一律保持為選取。However, after an item is selected, the control must always have at least one item selected. ## Examples 下列範例顯示實作此方法需要隨時都要選取的項目清單。The following example shows an implementation of this method for a list that requires an item to be selected at all times. [!code-csharp[UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip#IsSelectionRequired](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/CSharp/ListFragment.cs#isselectionrequired)] [!code-vb[UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip#IsSelectionRequired](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/visualbasic/listfragment.vb#isselectionrequired)]
